issue.short_desc: Improve filter performance upon list change
Filter regex fails with special characters
Error in setting header value in TableComparatorSelector
MutationList return "parent" source instead of its own
ListChangeSequence hasNext() fails when there's no next
IndexedTree insert and remove are too slow
Expose prepareRenderer from JTable into ListTable class
set(), add(), remove() etc. not implemented
CachingList dumps all values whenever the list is changed
Add DeltaList for consistency with derivatives of WritableMutationList
Replace global lock with reader/writer locks
Lists may fail if the change event indicies are out of order
ToString on BasicEventList, MutationList no good
UniqueList sometimes does not forward events on a DELETE
UniqueList needs a means of forwarding non-mandatory change events
GlazedLists requires a counted, unique view of a given list.
TableComparatorChooser icon can get out of sync
Sorted List fails upon intensive filtering
remove(object), clear() can have unwanted side effects
UniqueList, FilterList fire multiple events for some operations
Migrationkit's DynamicQueryList fails to forward events
Implement Chunk Transfer Protocol client & servers
UniqueList events delete indicies that do not exist
UniqueList and SortedList not optimized for contains and containsAll methods
read-only access is broken once a ReadOnlyList is decorated by a writable list.
SortedList fires insert & delete instead of updates
SortedList indexOf() etc. make multiple tree calls
EventLists don't get garbage collected unless source list is garbage collected..
Multithreading problem in demo app & tutorial part 6.
SortedList fires empty events on setComparator
SparseList makes 2 tree calls when 1 will suffice
UI does not allow to remove sorting order
TableHeader indicator arrows point the wrong way
TableComparatorChooser sort arrow indicators not right aligned
TableComparatorChooser needs icons for new Java l&fs
GlazedLists is inconsistent in what exception is thrown on bounds checking
CompressableList uses multiple nodes when one will do
TableComparatorChooser breaks when column count changes
Demo app description table repaints twice for each selection change
Test classes should be in test/ tree
Sublist follows an element through sort, filter, other changes
BeanTableFormat, BeanFilterator broken for read-only properties
Create package-renamer for Spring RCP integration
EventSelectionModel throws exception on lead select
TableFormat should have a getColumnClass() method.
UniqueList still uses CompressableList not Barcode.
SWT TextFilterList should be as good as the Swing one
TextFilterList breaks violently if filter goes from 0 to many
CTP Bind failure should throw IOException
Resource Block Peer needs concurrency strategy
Automatic reconnect in Resource Block Peer
SWT Selection Event List for SWT
Keep filter strings as upper case for better performance
SWT Viewer class for Sliders for ThresholdList
Potential DoS in Network Glazed Lists
NetworkList could suck up all ram
Glazed Lists NetworkLists should have smart URIs
Nasty ClassCastException when user sorts a column with Boolean properties
Glazed Lists should recover from RuntimeExceptions
Swing JTable selection can result in a RuntimeException
Swing Demo descriptions table never has any contents.
Swing - selection inversion (to be on par with SWT)
Thread proxies should acquire read locks
SWT virtual table doesn't allow rows to be garbage collected
Swing thread proxying can be enhanced
Nested change events should support contradictions
Add a tree based list to compete with ArrayList
The demo won't load from the website.
The selection driven descriptions are incorrect in some instances.
SWT ThresholdViewers support Slider but not Scale
Set up forums for the casual user
Sort indicator icons in SWT Table
EventTableModel should support changing the EventList
The 'test' Ant task doesn't reference 'io' as a dependency.
Sorting icon disappears when clicking on a non-sortable column
TableComparatorChooser should accept also an EventList
